column6: בְּרֵאשִׁ֖ית (Prep-b | N-fs: Preposition-b :: Noun - feminine singular) בָּרָ֣א (V-Qal-Perf-3ms: Verb - Qal - Perfect - third person masculine singular) אֱלֹהִ֑ים (N-mp: Noun - masculine plural) אֵ֥ת (DirObjM: Direct object marker) הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם (Art | N-mp: Article :: Noun - masculine plural) וְאֵ֥ת (Conj-w | DirObjM: Conjunctive waw :: Direct object marker) הָאָֽרֶץ׃ (Art | N-fs: Article :: Noun - feminine singular)
